item.title: How do i add npc drops
item.dc:creator: @playermanny2 playermanny2
item.description:
@playermanny2 wrote:

in item2.java
add

[code]public static int NAME[] = {itemid,itemid};

    public static int randomNAME()
    {
        return NAME[(int)(Math.random()*NAME.length)];
    }

[/code]

replace name with anynam you want-keep same name for everything though

now in npchandler.java

if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == npcid)
{
ItemHandler.addItem(Item2.randomNAME(), npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false);
}

replace name with the same name as before-keep same

then you’re done

Read full topic
